vk.bot_framework.dispatcher.extension module¶

class vk.bot_framework.dispatcher.extension.AbstractExtension¶

Bases: abc.ABC

abstract async get_events() → List¶

Get events from any resource and returns list of events. :return: list of coming events.

abstract async run(dp)¶

In endless cycle get events from self.get_events function and call dispatcher method dp._process_events. :param dp: dispatcher :return:

class vk.bot_framework.dispatcher.extension.BaseExtension¶

Bases: vk.bot_framework.dispatcher.extension.AbstractExtension, abc.ABC

May be added to extensions with ExtensionsManager and used for get events.

>>> extension_manager.run_extension(name=unique_key)
key = None¶
